node.display_name: Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs
node.display_long_description:
Join Red, Chuck, Bomb and the Blues to save the stolen eggs in Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs, an immersive VR adventure! 

Explore the remote island where the greedy green pigs take their vacation in 91 fun-filled levels (with more to come)! Make your way up to party city through the serene “Vacation Levels” of exotic beaches, steep cliffs and snowy slopes while destroying structures in the most spectacular way. Once the new boss pig Dr. Frankenswine takes over, it’s time to slingshot your way through even more challenging “Spooky Levels” gameplay, where the beaches are scary, the cliffs are creepy and the slopes are slimy.

But the fun doesn’t stop there! With the level builder, players not only have creative freedom to design and play their own levels featuring their favorite feathered friends, but they can now also share their creations, have them ranked by the greater Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs community and discover an unlimited amount of player-created content!

latest_supported_binary.change_log: Just in time for Halloween, Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs is now even spookier with the addition of the “Slimy Slopes” level pack, featuring 13 brand new Spooky Levels. In this third world of the Spooky Levels, players will yet again meet Dr. Frankenswine and must defeat him to get a step closer to saving the stolen eggs.

nodes.title: Game Update: Dr. Frankenswine returns with 13 new levels!
nodes.body_text:
The horrifying Dr. Frankenswine is back with his minions. They're bringing along 13 new spooky levels set in Slimy Slopes. Pick up your slingshot and help Red, Chuck, Bomb and the Blues put a stop to Dr. Frankenswine's evil schemes!

Patch notes:
- A new level pack: Slimy Slopes is now available!
- Added hints on how to unlock spooky levels
- Added three more achievements
- Fixed an issue where the music sometimes stops playing in the spooky levels
- General bug fixes and polish

node.appName: Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs

node.reviewDescription:
This is a great game,  it single player gets boring. Multiplayer would allow me and my family and friends to continue to play together. Not sure if best way to make multiplayer but single player on my phone gets boring and single player in VR gets boring. Oculus created a way for friends and family to be even closer, so most games should really offer multiplayer. Plus once your board with levels whats left? But with multiplayer mode it’s something to do while hanging out with your peeps. 
Just a suggestion. Keep up the good work. 
The last star is waiting for multiplayer mode. Obviously the quest is here to stay and replace everything else, so don’t even invest any time in other headsets. Just Quest units.

developerResponse.body: Thank you for the review and the honest feedback! We just want you to know that this has not gone unnoticed. :)

website_page_meta.description: Join Red, Chuck, Bomb and the Blues to save the stolen eggs in Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs, an immersive VR adventure! Discover the remote island where the greedy pigs vacation; slingshot your way through 91 fun-filled levels (with more to come!) of beaches, cliffs and slopes; destroy structures in the most spectacular way to earn those all-important stars; and create, share and discover an infinite number of levels with the online level builder.
website_page_meta.title: Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs · Oculus Quest
